subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: When the senior forward Demetris Nichols missed a breakaway layup in the final minute of a tie game that the Orange eventually lost to Wichita State in early December, he never hid from reporters.
snippet: When the senior forward Demetris Nichols missed a breakaway layup in the final minute of a tie game that the Orange eventually lost to Wichita State in early December, he never hid from reporters.
